hero.title: Let's start something <highlight>together</highlight>
hero.description: I'm a recent computer science graduate excited to keep learning through real projects. If you need a teammate, a fresh pair of eyes, or someone curious to help, I'm all ears.

highlights.title: Ways we can collaborate
highlights.description: I'm still early in my career, so every challenge is an opportunity to grow. These are a few directions where I can add energy and learn fast.

projects.title: Build digital experiences
projects.description: Let's design and ship web apps, prototypes, or university ideas together. I'm eager to practice product thinking while delivering real value.

teams.title: Join your team
teams.description: I'm ready to contribute as a junior developer—learning your tools, collaborating in sprints, and growing alongside the team.

advisory.title: Pair up & learn
advisory.description: I'm always grateful for code reviews, pair-programming sessions, or advice on improving my workflow—and happy to share what I know in return.

community.title: Collaborate with the community
community.description: Hackathons, meetups, open-source issues—I'm keen to jump in, learn from others, and contribute wherever I can.

links.title: Reach me directly
links.description: Pick the channel that works best for you and I'll answer with curiosity and enthusiasm.

availability.title: What to expect
availability.description: Here's how I like to collaborate so you know what happens after you reach out.

points.timezone: Based in Barcelona (CET) and flexible with schedules
points.engagements: Open to everything from short experiments to longer-term learning
points.discovery: We'll start by understanding your goals and how I can contribute

availability.responseTime: Typical response time: within 2 business days

cta.title: Tell me what you're <highlight>exploring next</highlight>
